ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kaesora trouble
ygData.msgSnippet: like I said, best exp bar none. Since discovering this spot, we take EVERY guild member who is 45 there to get out of hell. It took what was the absolute worst
ygData.messageBody:
like I said, best exp bar none.

Since discovering this spot, we take EVERY guild member who is 45 there to
get out of hell. It took what was the absolute worst hell level (so bad, I
almost quit) and made it seem insignificant. The only down side is that it
greens out completely by 47.

Map:
http://www.eqmaps.com/m/kaesora2.gif

The area in question is the church, labeled 10 on the map.

Draelon

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 09, 2000 6:18 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Kaesora trouble


i got a map, but the only time i was ever there was day one of kunark we
stumbled in the place, and just this week to pick up the medallion for my VP
key and the fang for my charasis key (same trip). both times i was with
someone who knew the place, which i don't yet.

Shada

> What area?
>
>
> > wow that's insane at 45. i am thinking of taking my wife's
> 42 cleric
> there
> > for some experience *wink*
> >
> > Shada
